ai_analysis.summary: H2O.ai is promoting its convergence of predictive and generative AI for private and protected data, with a focus on sovereign AI for the enterprise and a new multimodal OCR model. The company is also hosting a live panel on secure GenAI in government, indicating potential business impact through partnerships and market expansion.
